Entries.Wed4: Sam told me that he found a job at the library.#$b#I mean, good for him, but I'm starting to think that was the only job opening in this whole stupid town.$s
Entries.Wed6: Unemployment sucks.$s#$e#I used to think of myself as a loser back when I worked for Joja, but this is a new low.#$b#Heh, I'd be impressed by how much more of a deadbeat I am now if it wasn't so awful.$s
Entries.Wed8: Sam found a job at the museum. Said he's pretty happy working there.#$e#Me? Well, business has been pretty good at the ranch lately, so Marnie can afford to have me as a full-time employee.#$b#I guess I'm her ranch hand and errand boy now.#$b#I mostly just carry things and tend to the chickens for her.$6
Entries.fall_Wed8: Sweet Yoba, mushrooms keep cropping up all over the place.$3#$b#Now I have to check all the pastures for them to make sure none of the animals accidentally poison themselves.#$b#Talk about a pain in the neck.$3
Entries.Wed10: I wish I'd quit my job at Joja sooner. I make a decent living by working on the ranch, and Marnie needs the help.#$e#I'm starting to really love what I do there. I guess this is why you moved out here, huh?$6
